page.title: 01ASCOT/BRACKNELL, BERKSHIRE.
page.content:
The area in{Berkshire}allotted to our group is mainly mixed forest land crossed by two main roads, Swinley Road (A332) Ascot to Bagshot and the Bagshot Road (322) Bracknell to Bagshot.
Much of the{forest land}belongs to the{Crown Estates}and has two main uses:{forestry}and{recreation.} The former is carried out at the Swinley Sawmill (A332) and the latter at the Swinley Forest Golf Course.
The North-West of our region includes some of the newer parts of {Bracknell New Town,}the{neighbourhoods of{Harmans Water}and{Crown Wood.} In the North-East of it there is a small part of{South Ascot;}a{housing estate} built in the 1950's and some private housing which has been added since.
